mapper.select: select id as id, type as type, lock_flag as lockFlag, pay_flag as payFlag, amount as amount, create_time as createTime, create_user as createUser, update_time as updateTime, update_user as updateUser, description as description, version as version, status as status, field_01 as field01, field_02 as field02, field_03 as field03, field_04 as field04, field_05 as field05 from t_information_certificate where type = #{type} and lock_flag = #{lockFlag} limit 1
